Text:
Am downloading now, but.... not sure if 477 kbps is enough for 720x304 resolution. 

It might be for x264, but XviD is less efficient (though preferable otherwise). Could have saved a lot on filesize by converting 448kbs AC3 to MP3 at 96kbps.

Yup, 477 kbps is plenty because this isn't an action movie (lots of action requires a higher bitrate). 

A 10
V 9
M ?
